title: Samples
medium:
Medium: synthetic, cotton, hair (?)

description: Samples of textured and metallic yarns side by side. Component A has a warp of red boucle yarns and a weft of smooth red yarns with flat metallic thread. Component B has a warp of off-white boucle yarns and a weft of smooth off-white yarns with flat metallic thread.
name: Samples
